content: This already has a github approval - does anyone else want to take a look?
@maintainers I think it looks good, but I wouldn't mind having a 2nd pair of eyes on it.
@Johan Commelin: note this has changed a little since you last commented there
Yury's quaternion PR made me realize that I can define def star_ring_equiv [semiring R] [star_ring R] : R ≃+* Rᵒᵖ as a more heavily bundled version of the star_add_monoid_hom that you suggested
